plot: Hirono Kenta has the strangest dream anyone could think of, being the Hero of Justice. His odd desire has driven him to make his own costume of his own made up hero, Wingman. By a stroke of luck, he meets Yume Aoi, the princess of the dreamscape called Botoreem, whom has a Dream Note. The Dream Note is a book that can make any dream come true. Hirono draws Wingman in the book and soon his made up hero becomes a reality. With this new power Hirono, Aoi, and Hirono's childhood friend Miku, the must save Botoreem from Rimeru, an evil man wishing to take the Dream Note and take over Botoreem. Maybe while saving a doomed land Hirono can make up his mind on who he has feelings for, Miku or Aoi.
opening_theme: "異次元ストーリー" by Popura
